body: @fmeum excellent! Can #23534 be released in bazel 7.3.x or 7.4?
Also, the flag you're looking for is actually `--override_repository=+fetcher+artifact1=...`.

Work towards #19301
Fixes #23580

RELNOTES: `override_repo` and `inject_repo` can be used to override and inject repos in module extensions.

issue.title: [7.4.0] Add `override_repo` and `inject_repo`

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps

labels.name: team-Documentation
labels.description: Documentation improvements that cannot be directly linked to other team labels

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
Work towards https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/19301
Fixes https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/23580

RELNOTES: `override_repo` and `inject_repo` can be used to override and inject repos in module extensions.

Closes https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/pull/23534.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 678139661
Change-Id: Iea7caca949c00e701f056c1037e273fee9740e93

(cherry picked from commit https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/commit/46341b1a59c7a1cc8ca0dc604ad53b6de7fee653)

Fixes #23724
Fixes #23799

Also includes:
* Disallow importing injected repos (8472c9df4d24fe5a54079fe302fe455bccf6930d)
